column4: hey, how do i upgrade my 7.10 to 8.04 by just using a cd? i don't want to download all the files again.
i don't want to burn a cd :P
What Version Of Ubuntu do you have?
I dont think HDA is good on Hardy
when its done, at the top it should say "A New OS is avaible" Or somthing like that
it says it already actually xD
but it doesn't attempt to get it from the CD i don't think
The 8.04 installation files aren't on a CD unless you downloaded the cd ISO
i have the ubuntu-8.04-desktop-i386.iso mounted so
oh! Why didn't you say so. Just burn it to A CD, then boot to it.
lol, but i don't want to burn =/ i don't have any CDs
Then you have to update from the update manager or go out and buy some CD-Rs.
